meanings.sent1: The child wandered through the forest in an unknowing manner.
meanings.sent2: She felt unknowing about the upcoming test.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unknowing curiosity led it into a funny situation.
meanings.sent4: His unknowing actions caused more trouble than he realized.
meanings.sent5: The unknowing look on her face revealed her confusion.

meanings.definition: Done or experienced without awareness or knowledge
meanings.sent1: The unknowing driver missed the turn.
meanings.sent2: He made an unknowing mistake in his calculations.
meanings.sent3: The unknowing chef added salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent4: Her unknowing decision led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent5: The unknowing hiker wandered off the trail and got lost.
